name: @kt3k/license-checker
description: A utility for checking license headers in the files in a directory.

tasks.cov: deno test --coverage=coverage --unstable --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-net=0.0.0.0:8000 test.ts && deno coverage --unstable --lcov coverage > coverage/lcov.info
tasks.udd: deno run -A https://deno.land/x/udd@0.5.0/main.ts deps.ts serve.ts test.ts dnt.ts
